ComicInfo.Series: Star Trek: The Motion Picture - Echoes
ComicInfo.Summary: Echoes [Part 3]: Aboard a Romulan ship, Kirk and Uhura attempt to track down Akris' destructive weapon, while Sulu and General Uhura escape from their Romulan captors and race to get a seriously wounded Chekov back to the Enterprise for treatment. Meanwhile in command of the Enterprise, Spock must deal with an admiral who is unhappy that Kirk has crossed into the Neutral Zone.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 02:50:33. [CVDB1000445] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 15:21:32. [Issue ID 2554996]

Commander Nyota Uhura,Admiral Ubah Mohamed,Lt. Commander Hikaru Sulu,Lt. Pavel Chekov,Admiral James T. Kirk
